Sin" Luttrell Mattytime }} 'Primer 55' is an American nu metal band from
Louisville, Kentucky. The name originates from the combination of
Primer, meaning "something that's unfinished," and 55, which refers to
Interstate 55, "the road that drugs run on to get to Chicago through
Memphis". http://www.voxonline.com/alternative/primer_-
55/vox_interviews_primer_55.htm
categories: Heavy metal musical groups from Kentucky
